response.original_title: 呪霊村 日本の村で撮られた恐怖映像 総集編
response.overview: Here lies the haunting cries of spirits captured in villages facing adversity, abandoned villages lost to time, villages with tragic pasts, and cursed ghost towns. In an era where people and things concentrate in cities, these recordings reveal the lingering presence of souls. A terrifying collection of footage featuring sorrowful female spirits, vengeful ghosts filled with deep resentment, and multiple spirits attacking from all directions, guaranteed to leave a lasting trauma.
response.title: Cursed Spirit Village: A Anthology of Horror Footage Filmed in a Japanese Village

titles.title: Jurei Mura Nihon no Mura de Torareta Kyōfu Eizō Sōshūhen
